response.original_title: The Art of Sweeping Under the Rug
response.overview: An aspiring performer, a shut-in techie, a vapid couple, drunk punks, reality tv, spying on your neighbors, mysterious vhs tapes, Mini Frozen Quiches... and all the while, in the background world, something even more sinister is being allowed to happen.
response.title: The Art of Sweeping Under the Rug
